name: Back to Ziridium
overview: The objective of this 2015 SEUCK game created by Roberto Ricioppo is simple... Fly back to your home planet of Ziridium. Unfortunately your trip back home to Ziridium won't be that easy, as you will be facing battles against the alien forces. Can you fight down the aliens and reach home, or will your ship be destroyed so badly, the workers on board won't be able to restore it?
